entry.title: Bull mkt just getting started id think. VC investment is a contra
entry.summary:
Bull mkt just getting started id think. VC investment is a contra
John Reed Stark:â€‚In 2022, VCs poured over $21B into crypto startups. At mid-year 2023, that number is a paltry $500M. This dramatic decline is not a cyclical correction but rather a clear and convincing harbinger. Word on the street: The crypto-emperor has no clothes. https://finance.yahoo.com/news/crypto-vc-investment-drops-70-011330532.html

entry.title: RT QF Research: Re 2) next 1Y was ... high. N=12 and first day when Nasdaq outperformed Dow by 20% after a 6M window. Have posted correlated variation...
entry.summary:
RTâ€‚QF Research Re 2) next 1Y was ... high. N=12 and first day when Nasdaq outperformed Dow by 20% after a 6M window. Have posted correlated variations of extreme momentum. Sometimes ST consolidation or correction but bullish IT to LT. Usual caveats. FYI and data mining. https://twitter.com/ResearchQf/status/1668269924219863045
QF Research:â€‚1) NDX rose 20% above its 200D last W. Since '85 happened 16 times (for the 1st time in M's). Unsurprising often (not always) consolidated or pulled back ST, but 15/16 were up 1Y. Avg 1Y gain = 29.4%?! Momentum is often a thing. Only exception 2/17/87 (rose 6M then the crash).
